subject: Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday night, the country’s top high school player, Nerlens Noel, picked the Wildcats by shaving a UK logo in the back of his head.
snippet: On Wednesday night, the country’s top high school player, Nerlens Noel, picked the Wildcats by shaving a UK logo in the back of his head.
